item.title: How do I get the ASCII value of a character?
item.description: To get the ASCII value of the character under the cursor, just press ga (or run :ascii). It'll print it in three format: in decimal, hexadecimal and octal. So, when your cursor is on an arrow and that you press ga: →, you'll see at the bottom: <→> 8594, Hex: 2192, Octal: 20622 Mnemonic: Get ASCII value. ­ from :help :ascii
